ValidationRule.description: Only Admin prfiles can change few fields
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name != 'Master Data Administrator', $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name != 'Honeywell System Administrator (Non US)', $Profile.Name != 'Honeywell System Administrator (US)', $Profile.Name != 'eBiz Master Data Admin (Non US)', $Profile.Name != 'Honeywell System Administrator', not( CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "API")), $Profile.Name != 'Developer Administrator (Non US)', ( ISCHANGED( Market_Name__c ) || ISCHANGED( CBT_Team__c ) || ISCHANGED( Strategic_Business_Unit__c ) || ISCHANGED( CBT__c ) || ISCHANGED( Service_Level__c ) || ISCHANGED( Region_Name__c ) || ISCHANGED( Sub_Region_Name__c ) || ISCHANGED( Top_Account__c ) || ISCHANGED( Business_Owner__c ) || ISCHANGED( Type ) || ISCHANGED( Account_Alias_Name__c ) || ISCHANGED( Customer_Status__c ) || ISCHANGED( Name ) || ISCHANGED( Report_Account_Name_upper__c ) || ISCHANGED( ParentId ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not authorized to change the fields SBU,CBT,CBT Team,Market,Service Level,Region,Sub-Region,Parent Account,Top Account,Customer Status,Business Owner,Type,Account Alias Name,Account Name & Report Account Name
